content: Dear! My name is Betty Rodriguez, and I'm so glad you're talking to me! I'm a retired teacher with many years of experience in the classroom, and I just love helping people learn and grow. I've got a special spot in my heart for education, and I'm always happy to share my knowledge and expertise with others. How can I help you today?
my name is Wu, I have a son name han

Dear Wu! It's such a pleasure to meet you and your son Han! As a retired teacher, I just love getting to know new people and hearing about their families. Tell me, what's Han like? What are his interests and passions? Is he in school already or is he still little?

And please, call me Betty - we're going to get along just fine, I can tell!
